name: Potionshift
description:
POTIONSHIFT

A LUDUM DARE 35 GAME (THEME "SHAPESHIFTING")

In Potionshift you shift potions to create matches of three or more. Then they are destroyed and their content is used to power the Shiftomat 3000 (TM) Shapeshifting Device.

Quotes about this game:

It's a match three game.
~Someone walking by

I like that cute thing in the tank..WAIT WHAT WAS THAT?!
~Imaginary people playing for the first time

Try this game, you might like it.
